titles.title: SUCCESS Act of 2023
SUCCESS Act of 2023
Support for Universities and Colleges to Champion the Educational Success of Survivors Act of 2023
A bill to establish a grant program for institutions of higher education to implement patient-centered academic counseling services for student survivors of sexual assault and other violence.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Support for Universities and Colleges to Champion the Educational Success of Survivors Act of 2023 or the SUCCESS Act of 2023
This bill requires the Department of Education to award competitive grants to eligible institutions of higher education for implementing patient-centered academic counseling services and other services for students who are survivors of sexual assault and other violence.
